Package org.jlab.epsci.ersap.std.cli

Class CommandUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.epsci.ersap.std.cli.CommandUtils
  • public final class CommandUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helpers to run CLI commands.

    • Method Detail

      • getEditor

        public static java.lang.String getEditor()
        Gets the default text editor of the user. This is the program defined by $EDITOR environment variable. If the variable is not set, use nano.
        Returns:
        the default editor defined by the user

      • editFile

        public static int editFile​(java.nio.file.Path file)
        Opens the given file in the default text editor of the user.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be edited
        Returns:
        the exit status of the editor program

      • checkProgram

        public static boolean checkProgram​(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if the given program exists in $PATH.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the program
        Returns:
        true if the program was found in $PATH

      • runProcess

        public static int runProcess​(java.lang.String... command)
        Runs the given CLI program as a subprocess, and waits until it is finished. The subprocess will be destroyed if the caller thread is interrupted.
        Parameters:
        command - a string array containing the program and its arguments
        Returns:
        the exit value of the subprocess

      • runProcess

        public static int runProcess​(java.lang.ProcessBuilder builder)
        Starts the subprocess defined by the given subprocess builder, and waits until it is finished. The subprocess will be destroyed if the caller thread is interrupted.
        Parameters:
        builder - the builder of the subprocess to be run
        Returns:
        the exit value of the subprocess

      • destroyProcess

        public static void destroyProcess​(java.lang.Process process)
        Destroys the given subprocess.
        Parameters:
        process - the subprocess to be destroyed

      • uninterruptibleCommand

        public static java.lang.String[] uninterruptibleCommand​(java.lang.String... command)
        Wraps the given CLI program into a script that ignores when the user presses CTRL-C. The output of the command will be printed to the standard output.
        Parameters:
        command - a string array containing the DPE program and its arguments
        Returns:
        the wrapper program that runs the given command

      • uninterruptibleCommand

        public static java.lang.String[] uninterruptibleCommand​(java.lang.String[] command,
                                                        java.nio.file.Path logFile)
        Wraps the given CLI program into a script that ignores when the user presses CTRL-C. The output of the command will be printed to the standard output and also logged into the given log file.
        Parameters:
        command - a string array containing the DPE program and its arguments
        logFile - the path to the log file
        Returns:
        the wrapper program that runs the given command
